verses.verse: Come <S%H3212><s%>, and let us return <S%H7725><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: for he has torn <S%H2963><s%>, and he will heal <S%H7495><s%> us <S%H5221><s%>; he has struck, and he will bind us up <S%H2280><s%>.

After two days <S%H3117><s%> will he revive <S%H2421><s%> us <S%H7992><s%>: in the third day <S%H3117><s%> he will raise us up <S%H6965><s%>, and we shall live <S%H2421><s%> in his sight <S%H6440><s%>.

Then shall we know <S%H3045><s%>, if we follow <S%H7291><s%> on to know <S%H3045><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: his going forth <S%H4161><s%> is prepared <S%H3559><s%> as the morning <S%H7837><s%>; and he shall come <S%H935><s%> unto us as the rain <S%H1653><s%>, as the latter <S%H4456><s%> and former rain <S%H3384><s%> unto the earth <S%H776><s%>.

O Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, what shall I do <S%H6213><s%> unto you <S%H3063><s%>? O Judah, what shall I do <S%H6213><s%> unto you <S%H2617><s%>? for your goodness is as a morning <S%H1242><s%> cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and as the early <S%H7925><s%> dew <S%H2919><s%> it goes away <S%H1980><s%>.

Therefore have I hewed <S%H2672><s%> them by the prophets <S%H5030><s%>; I have slain <S%H2026><s%> them by the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>: and your judgments <S%H4941><s%> are as the light <S%H216><s%> that goes forth <S%H3318><s%>.
For I desired <S%H2654><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%>, and not sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>; and the knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> more than burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>.
But they like men <S%H120><s%> have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%>: there have they dealt treacherously against me <S%H898><s%>.
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is a city <S%H7151><s%> of them that work <S%H6466><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%>, and is polluted <S%H6121><s%> with blood <S%H1818><s%>.

And as troops <S%H1416><s%> of robbers wait <S%H2442><s%> for a man <S%H376><s%>, so the company <S%H2267><s%> of priests <S%H3548><s%> murder <S%H7523><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> by consent <S%H7926><s%>: for they commit <S%H6213><s%> lewdness <S%H2154><s%>.

I have seen <S%H7200><s%> a horrible thing <S%H8186><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: there is the whoredom <S%H2184><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, Israel <S%H3478><s%> is defiled <S%H2930><s%>.
Also <S%H3063><s%>, O Judah, he has set <S%H7896><s%> a harvest <S%H7105><s%> for you <S%H7725><s%>, when I returned the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>.
